name: スーパーマリオワールド マリオとヨッシーの冒険ランド
summary: Super Mario World: Mario to Yoshi no Bouken Land is an interactive anime video based on the game Super Mario World. It is designed for use with Bandai's Terebikko system, which utilizes a telephone-shaped microphone to "interact" with the video. It asks the viewer multiple choice questions, such as what will hatch from Yoshi's egg.
info:
• 话数: 1
  • 别名: Super Mario World: Mario to Yoshi no Bouken Land
  • 发售日: 1991
